Description: Child's toy, a figure of a small pig moulded of clay, its wooden tail and tongue moved by a string.
Curator's comments: Described as modern in the register.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
Acquisition notes: Given by A W Franks who had been given it by Greville Chester
